ProductInfo.Features:
Support P2P Remote One Touch Online; With HDMI output (1920 * 1080)
16CH support 8CH playback at same time; 400/480fps 2D1@25fps+14CIF@25fp
With H.264 High efficiency Video Compression; Build-in 3322.org,dyndns.net, oray.net, myq-see.com free DDNS
16CH comes standard with HVR, NVR, support 2 * 1080P / 4 * 720P / 9 * D1 cameras and other network access functions
Support Symbian, S60V3/V5, Windows mobile, Iphone, android , BlackBerry, mobile phone live view via 3G net; Support IE review and CMS(can manager over 500 units DVR)
